mapper.sql: emp_id, service_id, location, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select:
select
from emp_offer where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status='ENABLE'
mapper.insert: insert into emp_offer (emp_id, service_id, location, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{empId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into emp_offer (emp_id, service_id, location, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{item.empId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT})
